resource.string: Revert as a good faith edit with a custom reason
$1 with score $2 on $3 has been inserted to whitelist
Matches any word that contains this string
Downloading diff using a web rendering fallback, please wait...
Send message to target user with explanation for block
Note: $1 is tagged as a shared or dynamic IP address.
$1 is already affected by a rangeblock on $2.\nThis block will override the effect of the rangeblock. Continue?
No user info was present in the query (are you sysop?)
There is no user to block.
This shortcut is already being used by $1, please choose a different one
Open browser links in a new browser window
Show new edits to the selected page as they are made
Use IRC feed for recent changes if possible
Require confirmation for revert of edit that was made in user space
Require confirmation for revert of edit that was made by whitelisted user
Require confirmation for revert of talk page
Send welcome messages to users with empty talk page on good edit
Automatically resolve conflicts with other users who revert or change the page
Use instant reverts (very fast, but can't be cancelled once executed)
Revert newer edits to page than displayed diff in case they were made by same user (same vandal)
Change all huggle settings to behave more like huggle 2
Merge your messages with others in existing sections
Use months as headers instead of name of page
Use automatic warning type and level on "send warning" function
Remove edits that were already reverted by someone else
Remove old edits if newer edit to same page is parsed
Automatically load history and user info (requires lot of network connection)
Display last revision of page in case currently loaded edit is not a last revision (will post-download it bypassing cache)
Require a delay after every load of next edit, for which it is not possible to use any write feature (useful when you need to resolve keyboard multi-press bug)
Time for which you need to wait between edit features are enabled (seconds):
Make the columns of lists dynamic (will resize based on size of items) or manual (user can change their size)
Display a notification when you receive a new message on your talk page
Page title in every diff (large text which show just a page title in top of every diff)
Highlight summary when present instead of when it's missing
Confirm multiple reversions of an edit by the same user
Confirm reversion to an edit by the user being reverted
Confirm reversion of own edits (except undo)
Confirm reversion to an edit by a warned user
Confirm reversion to edit by an anonymous user in the same /16 range as the user being reverted
After reverting, move to next edit in the queue
When asked to warn a user with a final warning
Prompt for block if asked to warn a user with a final warning
Download the whole history of all articles
Shortcut '$1' conflicts with the existing shortcut for '$1'.
You can't use : in name of queue
Check for beta versions if available
Error: Retrieving the delete token failed. The reason provided was: $1
There was no token returned by the query
No page info was present in query (are you sysop?)
This is not the latest revision of this page. Make sure you reviewed the newer versions as well. Please also keep in mind that rollback may not be possible from this point.

This item can't be undone. The page might have been changed or deleted meanwhile, and Huggle is unable to perform undo from this point. If you really want to undo it, you will need to do that by hand using the MediaWiki interface.

This user has already reached warning level 4, so no further templates will be delivered to them. You can report them now, but please, make sure that they already reached the proper number of recent warnings! You can do so by clicking the "talk page" button in the following form. Keep in mind that this form and this warning are displayed whether your revert was successful or not, so you might conflict with other users here (double check if the user isn't already reported). Do you want to report this user?
You are going to report user $1
Please select a diff in list in order to open preview
This user is not reported now
No diffs were provided as evidence. This will make it very hard for administrators to figure out whether the user is a vandal or not. Are you sure you want to continue?
The user has already been reported

the query for the page contents returned no data.

The author of the target revision, $2, is in the same range as the author of the current revision, $1, and may be the same person. Ensure the target revision is correct before proceeding. Continue?
